SEARCH
Package org.jlab.phaser

Interface PhaserServerConsole

All Known Implementing Classes:
NettyJsonConsole
public interface PhaserServerConsole
A contract for classes to issue commands to the phaser server.

When a method from this class returns without exception it means that the command was successfully completed and all notifications arising as a result have already been dispatched.

  • Method Details

    • cavities

      LinkedHashSet<String> cavities() throws CommandException
      Returns the set of all cavities which are eligible for phasing. The set is ordered alphabetically, which happens to also be S-coordinate order (distance from injector).
      Returns:
      The ordered set of cavities
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to obtain the set

    • applyCorrections

      void applyCorrections(BigInteger[] resultIdArray) throws CommandException
      Apply phase error corrections for the result IDs in the supplied array.
      Parameters:
      resultIdArray - The result ID array
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to apply the corrections

    • start

      void start(JobSpecification job) throws CommandException
      Starts the phasing process with the supplied job specification.
      Parameters:
      job - The job specification
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to start the phasing process

    • pause

      void pause() throws CommandException
      Pause the phasing process.
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to pause the phasing process

    • resume

      void resume() throws CommandException
      Resume the phasing process.
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to resume the phasing process.

    • serverVersion

      String serverVersion() throws CommandException
      Fetch the server version from the server.
      Returns:
      The server version string
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to query the server for it's version string.

    • stop

      void stop() throws CommandException
      Stop the phasing process.
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to stop the phasing process.

    • skip

      void skip() throws CommandException
      Skip phasing of the current cavity.
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to skip phasing of the current cavity.
